message.content:
cs.HC, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.SD, cs.CV

Reasoning: The paper discusses various types of realities and their applications, including virtual reality, augmented reality, mixed reality, and mediated reality. These topics are closely related to human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and graphics (cs.GR). The paper also proposes a new type of reality called Multimediated Reality, which involves multiple senses and actuation, and is therefore related to multimedia (cs.MM) and signal processing (cs.SD). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of synthetic synesthesia, which is related to computer vision (cs.CV).
